attributes.action: Bring attention to hydroxychloroquine, zinc and Azithromycin to treat CV19
attributes.additional_details: This should be done because it will save many lives.  This information has been suppressed and it is time to release the correct treatments.  There is no time for a forced vaccine which has not been tested.
attributes.background: Ask real practicing medical doctors about the use of HYDROXYCHLOROQUINE, Zinc and Azithromycin, as a treatment against Covid19.  Bring forward the proof from Doctors using the above medicines to treat Covid19 in the USA.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about Covid-19, but we're not sure what you want to happen. The UK Parliament and Government don't make decisions about what drugs people with Covid-19 are treated with. Medical doctors already make decisions about what treatments to provide and information about treatments is not being suppressed. 

You can find out how to spot false information online here: https://sharechecklist.gov.uk/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
